<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Metadata &#42; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;MetadataLoader.cpp&#125;::BitcodeReaderMetadataList::getMetadataIfResolved (unsigned Idx)</>}>
Return the given metadata only if it is fully resolved.

Gives the same result as <em><a href="#ac3901ff56e9318392be6e1613da5f660">lookup()</a></em>, unless <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode/#ac8c31a76a81b27c7307d65575b62084f">MDNode::isResolved()</a></em> would give <code>false</code>.

### MetadataPtrs {#ad21d03469694c34b03a2e8b3c51ba2a4}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>SmallVector&lt;TrackingMDRef, 1&gt; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;MetadataLoader.cpp&#125;::BitcodeReaderMetadataList::MetadataPtrs</>}>
Array of metadata references.

Don&#39;t use std::vector here. Some versions of libc++ copy (instead of move) on resize, and <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/trackingmdref">TrackingMDRef</a> is very expensive to copy.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/bitcode/lib/bitcode/reader/metadataloader-cpp/#l00095">95</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/bitcode/lib/bitcode/reader/metadataloader-cpp">MetadataLoader.cpp</a>.
